definition: to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
(equivalent to 的 as possessive particle)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.chinese: 他稍稍一瞥，景物尽收眼底。

sentences.english: If you stand on top of the pagoda, you'll have a panoramic view of the entire town.
sentences.chinese: 要是站在塔顶，可以把全镇的美景尽收眼底。

sentences.english: After climbing the hilltop, you have a panoramic view of mountain scenery.
sentences.chinese: 登上山巅以后，山下的景致尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Peak overlooks, Anlu panoramic view of the county seat.
sentences.chinese: 峰顶眺望，安陆县城尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Iron bridge, the beauty of the panoramic view of the Snake River.
sentences.chinese: 登上铁桥，蛇河的美景尽收眼底。

sentences.english: A ride on a gondola will give you a fascinating view of Venice.
sentences.chinese: 坐上冈多拉会让你将威尼斯的迷人美景尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Standing here, you find all the Bund, the Huangpu River and the city in sight4.
sentences.chinese: 站在这里，外滩啊，黄浦江啊，个城市都尽收眼底。

sentences.english: There is a vantage point where you can see all parts of the city.
sentences.chinese: 有一个地方可以把惠远城尽收眼底。

sentences.english: You can have a magnificent view of the Qiantang River from the top of the Six Harmonies Pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 从六和塔的顶层看，钱塘江的壮丽景色尽收眼底。

sentences.english: Shing Mun boarded floor, "Yazhou eight scenic spots" panoramic view.
sentences.chinese: 登上城门楼，可以将“崖州八景”尽收眼底。

sentences.english: As the man looked out the window, all he saw was a blinding snowstorm.
sentences.chinese: 男人向窗外望去，尽收眼底的是茫茫的大雪。

sentences.english: A wide prospect opened below us.
sentences.chinese: 向下看一片空阔的景色尽收眼底。

definition: to overlook/to look down from a height
to gaze into the distance
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
to cover all at one glance (idiom)/a panoramic view
be plainly visible
to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on
to survey the scene from an elevated position
view/scenery/scene
scenery/scene/landscape/view
as far as the eye can see
beautiful scenery
lookout/viewing platform/observation deck
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
wonderful scenery
to overlook/to look down at
to lean on sth and gaze into the distance
